column1: Smoque BBQ////So I came here for the first time during Covid of 2020 in September. It was outdoor seating
column3: that's good! The cleanliness of the tables were impeccable. Though the food
column5: it wasn't the best. But the prices were fair. I feel like the meat
column6: despite adding more sauce to it
column7: was a bit dry. Other than that
